metadata.title: CVE-2016-0402 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the Java SE and Java SE Embedded components inOracle Java SE 6u105, 7u91, and 8u66 and Java SE Embedded 8u65 allowsremote attackers to affect integrity via unknown vectors related toNetworking.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openjdk-8-demo - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-jamvm - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u72-b15-1
openjdk-8-source - 8u72-b15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u72-b15-1').
